title: Would it be Possible...
content:
Would it be possible, perhaps some time in   
the future, if Typophile had it's own label,   
if it morphed into an online 'foundry' that   
sold original fonts, developed right here in   
these forums? I know it is a lot of work for   
the Punchcut crew, but there must be a   
reasonable amount of traffic through here   
to generate sales. Or is this just silly?   
   
kris.
author: kris
